title: Together
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2IUshE5

by ThoughtfulBreadPolice

Storms would come. Of course they would. Being Avengers guaranteed it. But they would weather them. Together.

blog.name: churro-parker
blog.title: it's always missing tony+nat hours
blog.description: || belle || bi || minor || Major Peter Parker Enthusiast || this blog is 97% marvel and 3% dc || i'll take requests! imagines, moodboards, headcanons, all that good stuff || no smut ||

body:
Oct. 12 - Marvel

October 12th - “Who could do this?”

Fanfiction

MCU

Warnings - One (1) swear word

Word Count - 468 (just a small one)

((In which Emma is also a teenage Avenger!))

____________________________________

The three teenagers sat before Mr. Stark. They were doing a training exercise; he would give them a scenario, and they would have to come up with a good, super-hero worthy solution.

“Alright,” said Mr. Stark. “A highly populated building is on fire-” Emma tried to jump in, but Mr. Stark continued, “-and… the is a zombie outbreak spreading like wildfire, pun intended. You don’t know if some of the people in the building are zombies, and there are confirmed zombies creeping, slowly, but surely, up to you from the street. What do you do?”

“Call the Avengers!” Emma shouted for the 15th time.

“For the last time, Em, we are the Avengers!” Shuri couldn’t help but smile as Peter and Emma giggled. “Okay, if the people in the building are zombies,” said Shuri, “they could bite us while we save them. Emma should go in,”

“Wha- why me?” Emma asked her friend. “Why can’t either of you two go in the burning zombie building? Peter’s got radioactive blood! Can he even be zombified?”

“He can,” Mr. Stark told her just before Peter opened his mouth in protest. “And Shuri’s right. Let her explain.”

Shuri nodded, smirking. “You’ve got super-speed. You can go in and come out fast enough to save everyone, and if there is a zombie, you can get away fast enough that you won’t get bitten.”

“Plus, don’t you have electricity in your blood?” Peter chimed in. “You have lightning IN YOUR HANDS! If anyone’s immune to a zombie bite, it’s you.”

“She’s not.”

“Gee, thanks guys.” Emma sighed. “Well, if I’m going into the building to get the civilians, what are you two doing?“

“Peter’s trying to put out the fire while I’m kicking zombie ass,” Shuri provided. “Sorry,” she added, with a nervous glance towards Mr. Stark.

“Is that your final answer?” Mr. Stark asked them. They all looked at each other for a second, then nodded. “Here’s what happens: Emma burns to a crisp, Shuri gets zombified, and Peter comes back crying because it’s all his fault.”

Peter blushed. “Why do I have to cry, though?”

“Don’t lie, you would.” Emma laughed, poking him in the ribs. “What happened this time?”

“First of all,” Mr. Stark began, earning a groan from all three kids. “Shuri got bitten because it was one against… maybe 40? Emma died because Peter’s first instinct was to go in the building for water, then he realized he couldn’t. So he ran around trying to get water, and by the time he had water, the building had already burned down, with her, and all the people in it. Then he cried.”

“Who could do this?” Emma cried, frustrated. “It’s sooo hard! Even when you have a good plan, something can always go wrong! It’s inevitable!”

“That’s where we come in.” Mr. Stark told her. “Don’t worry, you’ll get the hang of it.”

blog.name: imagine-marvelously
blog.title: Moved to marvelousdaydreams
blog.description: @marvelousdaydreams

body:
Im gonna cry

You know in infinity war when Tony is in the sanctum and he says “this is him” (maybe this it?) after Bruce says Thanos sent Loki.

Yeah well I rewatched AOU right before I rewatched Infinity War and realized he was talking about that vision Wanda gave him and how he could have saved them.

It was never about New York.

It was a foreshadow like Tony thought it was.

blog.name: chuckreadsmarvel
blog.title: Make Mine Marvel!
blog.description: Wherein Chuck shares his journey through the Mighty Marvel canon by providing commentary on every issue he’s read.

summary: It would have been a bold move to keep Tony stuck inside his armor, but as Tony is a brilliant inventor, it would have made no...
body: It would have been a bold move to keep Tony stuck inside his armor, but as Tony is a brilliant inventor, it would have made no sense. It was inevitable he would find a solution. Unfortunately, the first solution required to be plugged into an electrical socket to recharge. More on that later.

reblog.comment: It would have been a bold move to keep Tony stuck inside his armor, but as Tony is a brilliant inventor, it would have made no sense. It was inevitable he would find a solution. Unfortunately, the first solution required to be plugged into an electrical socket to recharge. More on that later.

blog.name: queenofimagines
blog.title: I'm just a lil lonely and love writing
blog.description: Request something and I shall post an it when I can :)

summary: Request: Can u do something fluffy with a reader and tony as like a father figure? Warnings: It’s not my best work because I’m...
body:
Request: Can u do something fluffy with a reader and tony as like a father figure?

Warnings: It’s not my best work because I’m still getting back into the swing of things. I apologize!

You grew up in what most people would call a normal family. After all, you had two parents who loved you. But loving and liking or two very different things. Your mother, ever the caring woman she was, both loved and liked you. She took an interest in the things you liked simply because you liked them. And if it turned out that she wasn’t a huge fan of it, she would still listen and talk to you about whatever it was. She died a couple of years ago and you were left to the custody of your dad.

Your dad… he loved you, truly, he did, he just didn’t seem to like you all that much. He always seemed to get annoyed with you when you asked him questions or requested that he drive you places. You tried your best to be in his good graces; to do what he asked and to be someone he could be proud of. You even worked your butt off, spent countless hours losing sleep so that you could land the Stark internship alongside your dear friend Peter. But it still didn’t seem like enough. So now you use the internship as an opportunity to be away from home.

The people in the tower were nice enough. They would greet you in the mornings and bid you goodbye when they left. They would check in on you everytime they needed to drop by to speak with Tony and make polite conversation with you. Overall, it was much more pleasant than staying at home with your dad. You didn’t really think anyone would notice that you had been avoiding spending time at home. You were hoping people would just assume you were a hard worker. And some people did believe that, but Tony had watched over you since you had come to work with him. He found various pieces of machinery fixed or finished without any knowledge of doing it himself and after he had watched you a little more closely, he had found that you were the one helping him with the seemingly uncrackable problems he had run into.

You had come to see Tony as somewhat of a father figure. He was always the one who made sure you didn’t forget to eat, was always willing to come to important events you had, ones your parents weren’t always able to go to. He asked you about your school and your grades and all around just wanted to make sure you were happy. You really did appreciate Tony being there for and making you feel loved and wanted, but you felt it was a little silly to look at him as a father because it never felt like he saw you as a daughter. So you never told him. You just assumed he was probably being so kind because you were still a kid.

Tony was working on another prototype for his suit when he finally glanced at the clock and saw it was 11:34pm. He thought it odd that you hadn’t come to say goodbye yet, as you usually let him know when you were leaving so he wouldn’t freak out about where you were. Deciding to check, he put down his tools and walked to the lab he had set you up in. When he came in, he saw you slowly nod off. He was about to wake you up when you straightened out and appeared to be trying to not fall asleep.

“What’re you still doing here kiddo?” Tony asked.

“Oh hey, Mr. Stark. I was just finishing up the project you gave me.” Tony knew that was a lie. He saw the finished product earlier in the afternoon.

“Y/N, is there a reason you don’t want to go home?” The question startled you. You knew the answer. Of course you did. When being at home made you feel so lonely that you had no choice but to feel it, there wasn’t much room for confusion.

“Uh, what do you mean? I mean, why do you ask?”

“You know exactly what I mean and I’m asking because you’ve been staying here really late recently. I know well enough that it isn’t because you want to get your projects. I see you finish them way before your day is even done. At first, I thought maybe you thought the work was boring but if the things I give you really are that boring then you would take off right when you’re off the clock. But you’re here hours after you’re supposed to go home. Why don’t you want to go home?”

You didn’t know what to say. What were you even supposed to say? You could tell him why you didn’t want to go home but to tell him that the reason you stayed was that you didn’t get enough fatherly affection at home and that you desperately wanted that kind of parental affection from him was, frankly, unprofessional.

“I just like being here. Is that bad?” You defended.

“Kid. I’m not accusing you of anything. I just want to make sure you’re alright. This lab is completely bare and freezing. Why is it you like staying here so much?”

“Well, I mean you.” You said it as quietly as you could but by the way his eyes widened a fraction you could tell he heard. You could have easily said you liked the atmosphere and maybe it was because of your sleepy brain that you didn’t, and right now you were yelling at yourself in your head for not lying. The next best thing, you figured, was to explain yourself before he got the wrong idea.

“It’s just… Mr. Stark my dad and I… we don’t really get along. He loves me and all that but he just… would rather I not be around him so often. I stay away because of that and honestly I stay away because when he looks at me he doesn’t look like he loves me. He doesn’t look like he’s proud. He just looks like I’m another object that clutters up the living room.” Something wet was dropping on your had. Tear, you realized. You were crying. 

“I’m sorry you didn’t ask for any of this. I’ll go home now. See you tomorrow.” You got up and, with your head hung low, you tried to pass Tony as quickly as possible. Before you could make it any farther than where you stood, Tony pulled you into a hug. He held you so tight it felt like he was squeezing all of the tears from your eyes and onto his shirt. You felt bad for ruining what was probably a really expensive shirt but getting a hug from someone you saw as a father figure felt so right that you couldn’t help it.

“I’m so sorry Y/N. You don’t deserve that,” Tony said once you had calmed down. He pulled away so that he could look at you. “How about instead of staying in the lab when your day is done you come to my house. Pepper loves you and keeps bugging me about having you over for dinner anyway. You can get a break from your dad without having to stay in this desolate lab.”

“Really? Are you sure that’s okay?”

“It’s more than okay Y/N. I mean you’re practically family to Pepper and me so we might as well treat you like it too.” You launched yourself into his arms again for another hug. You were ecstatic that Tony saw you as a daughter just as you had seen him as a father. That night you went to Tony’s house and had, granted a very late, dinner with him and Pepper. Pepper had offered to set you up in their guest bedroom for the night and said that you could just borrow some clothes. You quickly shot your dad a text letting him know you weren’t coming home before turning in for the night.

From that day forward you would spend almost every day at the Stark household before going home. Tony and Pepper treated you like a daughter and often invited you to their holiday gathering, showing you off to their guests. Things with your father still hadn’t changed but now you had a second family you could turn to when you needed.

blog.title: Tiny Tony
blog.description: Non Avengers Quotes | #TeamTonyStark | Profile photo: Petite-Madame

summary:
Tony: What time is it, 3 A.M., 4 A.M.?
Steve: It’s six.
Tony: A.M.?!
Steve: No.
Tony: Oh. Is dinner ready?
body:
Tony: What time is it, 3 A.M., 4 A.M.?

Steve: It’s six.

Tony: A.M.?!

Steve: No.

Tony: Oh. Is dinner ready?

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Insight
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2pSHZXJ

by AliceN_Wolf

What was supposed to be an innocent look into the future for her friends well-being, Casey Madison saw so much more. A life lived in the Avengers Tower, a war… the world turning to dust… the love of her life gone. She has to warn Tony without putting the pressure to save everyone on his shoulders and the results of her first vision will come to light.

Can Casey help Tony make the right decisions to keep the universe from the path of destruction?

Words: 3719, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Original Female Character(s), Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Aunt May, Avengers Team (MCU), Happy (MCU), Ned Leeds, Michelle Jones
  • Relationships: Peter Parker/Original Female Character(s), Pepper Potts/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Clairvoyance, Telepathy, Precious Peter Parker, Parent Tony Stark, Parent Pepper Potts, Tony Stark Has A Heart


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2pSHZXJ

by AliceN_Wolf

What was supposed to be an innocent look into the future for her friends well-being, Casey Madison saw so much more. A life lived in the Avengers Tower, a war… the world turning to dust… the love of her life gone. She has to warn Tony without putting the pressure to save everyone on his shoulders and the results of her first vision will come to light.

Can Casey help Tony make the right decisions to keep the universe from the path of destruction?

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: In 2007, the world changed.  Loki led a Chitauri army into Manhattan, killing thousands.  If not for the heroes on the ground...
caption:
In 2007, the world changed.  Loki led a Chitauri army into Manhattan, killing thousands.  If not for the heroes on the ground that day, the death toll could have expanded into the millions – perhaps even billions.  One group rose to prominence in the wake of disaster: The Avengers.  Though they weren’t the only exceptional people defending the Earth that day, and their ranks were not limited to six for long, this small group became a beacon of hope for the world, and a lightning rod for ire from a few.

It seemed only fitting then, that those who were on hand when the infection sprang up in New York stood up to defend the people of the city once more.  It was startlingly familiar in some ways, the city overrun with beings bent on destroying everything in their path, so many people needing to be helped.  But if the Avengers are known for anything, it’s working together to rise to the occasion.

Mark Ruffalo is Bruce Banner
Garrett Hedlund is Clint Barton [TAKEN]
Chris Hemsworth is Thor Odinson [TAKEN]
Chris Evans is Steve Rogers [TAKEN]
Scarlett Johansson is Natasha Romanoff [TAKEN]
Robert Downey Jr. is Tony Stark

All FCs are recommendations and can be changed if players prefer.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted
